refnamediv.refpurpose: A UI interface that handles UI merging for a component

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Signal Prototypes
refsect1.synopsis: "exec-verb" void user_function (BonoboUIComponent *bonobouicomponent, gchar *arg1, gpointer user_data); "ui-event" void user_function (BonoboUIComponent *bonobouicomponent, gchar *arg1, gint arg2, gchar *arg3, gpointer user_data);

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The BonoboUIComponent is the client side portion of the UI merging scheme. It should be implemented by any component that wishes to merge menus / UI. The Component object is neccessary to receive notifications from the associated BonoboUIContainer. Notifications come in two forms - verbs and events. Verbs have an associated ( non translated ) name that is used to match them with callbacks. Events have an associated ( non translated ) id that does the same thing. Events pass a state string. Events are used for eg. toggle buttons, Verbs are used for eg. Menu items.

There are several standard placeholders that it is important for containers to implement, basing your UI on the doc/std-ui.xml is a very good starting point. Also in the above example the _label and _tip are not cmd / widget separated - for more information read doc/ui-xml.txt.

refsect2.title: bonobo_ui_component_freeze ()
refsect2.para: This increments the freeze count on the associated BonoboUIContainer, (if not already frozen) this means that a batch of update operations can be performed without a re-render penalty per update.
NB. if your GUI is frozen / not updating you probably have a freeze / thaw reference leak/

refsect2.title: bonobo_ui_component_thaw ()
refsect2.para: This decrements the freeze count on the remote associated BonoboUIContainer, (if frozen). This means that a batch of update operations can be performed without a re-render penalty per update.
NB. if your GUI is frozen / not updating you probably have a freeze / thaw reference leak/

refsect2.title: bonobo_ui_component_set_prop ()
refsect2.programlisting: void bonobo_ui_component_set_prop (BonoboUIComponent *component, const char *path, const char *prop, const char *value, CORBA_Environment *opt_ev);
refsect2.para: This helper function sets an XML property ( or attribute ) on the XML node pointed at by path. It does this by a read / modify / write process. If you find yourself doing this a lot, you need to consider batching this process.

listitem.simpara: the path to set the property on

refsect2.title: bonobo_ui_component_set_status ()
